name: Ho Ho Hold Up
description:
Story:

Whelp. It turns out the north pole isn't as wholesome as you might think! The elves don't even make the toys at all! It's all done by machines! The problem is the machines have a bloodlust and will only run on the magic properties of Elf Guts(tm).

In Ho Ho Hold Up, you play as Santa as you collect 250 Elf Guts in order to save Christmas!

Instructions:
Collect elves into your storage and throw them into the ELF CRUSHER 3000!

Controls:

WASD – Movement

Shift – Run

J – Suck Up Elves

K – Throw Elves

HINT:
Green elves are worth 1 Elf Gut, Blue are worth 2, Red 4 and Yellow 8!
